test: the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
plot_0_intro: You startle awake in a small clearing
You were having a horrible nightmare
but maybe you aren't fully awake yet...
plot_1_oddity: Hey there boss, how'd you sleep
I know I know, those nightmares are no joke
I've been watching over you for years now
and I've had enough of them, even if you haven't
I think now's the time to put an end to those nightmares
What do you say?
A memory, buried deep down, comes back to mind
From your time as an ■■■■■■■■ you know this thing,
this spirit, is an aberration.
Dream world aside, this things power is no joke.
And that power comes from ■■■■.
This aberration is very real.
It can ■■■■■ help you.
Thought so
Alright see these talismans around us?
We burn all 8, you get some peace and quiet
Half done already, and one is close by, where you woke up
Well, you know
Head's up, there's angry, hateful spirits on the way to these things.
If they get close, I'll keep you safe.
No harm will come to you
I promise
plot_1_oddity_debug: Wanna find 4 more talismans? Me too
plot_2_talisman: You take the talisman in your hands,
and feel the powerful swirl of emotions surrounding it
plot_3_ending: These things can't hurt you anymore, promise
See you on the other side
plot_3_ending_b: You have cast away the nightmares...
plot_4_intro: You startle awake in a small clearing
You were having a horrible nightmare
but maybe you aren't fully awake yet...
One restful night did a world of good,
But now it's almost like it never happened
Except you remember one thing from the happy dream
plot_5_talisman: You take the talisman in your hands,
Not from your previous time here
It's just a normal piece of paper, with a poem written on it.
Heavy eraser marks, lines scratched out, scribbles in the margins
It's an amateur poem for sure
You feel an urge to preserve this poem
You gently put it back where it was
plot_6_oddity: Hey there boss, how'd you sleep
I know I know, those nightmares are no joke
I've been watching over you for years now
and I've had enough of them, even if you haven't
I think now's the time to put an end to those nightmares
A deep buried memory comes to mind, now clear as day
From your time as an archiver, you know this thing
Dream world aside, this things power is no joke.
And that power comes from you.
plot_6_oddity_debug: Wanna find 4 more talismans? Me too
plot_7_ending: woo you did it! you woke up!
talisman_01: It's just a normal piece of paper, with a poem written on it.
Heavy eraser marks, lines scratched out, scribbles in the margins
It's an amateur poem for sure
talisman_02: It's a drawing of a landscape,
with rolling fields and mountains in the distance
talisman_03: It's a photograph of five girls out shopping
Slightly blurry, one of them blinked
talisman_04: It's a short story about a girl auditioning to be an idol
She fails and fails, but she makes it
talisman_05: It's a song, a duet with two singers
talisman_06: It's a hand-knit scarf, long and colorful
